# Tech Conference Template

> Auto-generated on 2026-02-05

## Preview

A tech conference website template with dark mode with neon accents.

## Features

- Team Section
- Hero Section With Cta
- Stats Counter
- Blog Preview

## Usage

1. Download or clone this template
2. Open `index.html` in your browser
3. Customize the content to fit your needs

## Tech Stack

- HTML5
- CSS3 (with custom properties, flexbox, grid)
- Vanilla JavaScript
- Responsive design
